text: @NikkiHaley The entire entertainment community is out of work because of this pandemic.  Every famous & non-famous actor, broadway gypsy, sound & lighting person, musician, conductor, singer, coach, stage manager, extra, usher, box-office staff, crew member, set caterer & it’s staff.... /1
